an3.61:2.5: ca me → te ce me (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
an3.61:7.1: Ahetuappaccayaṁ → ahetuṁ appaccayaṁ (bj); ahetuṁ (si); ahetu (sya-all, km); ahetuappaccayā (pts1ed); ahetuṁ appaccayaṁ (mr)
an3.61:14.2: (…) → (byādhipi dukkho) (bj, mr); (vyādhi pi dukkhā) (pts1ed) | appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho → etthantare pāṭho katthaci natthi
